Detailed Description

POSTable stores the table of part-of-speech tags, each tag includes a string value and its index code.

Note that the string value of part-of-speech tag is in Alphabet format such like "NP-S".

Definition at line 37 of file pos_table.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum jma::POSTable::POSFormat

POS format type.

Enumerator:
POS_FORMAT_DEFAULT  default Japanese format such like "名詞,一般".
POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET  Alphabet format such like "NC-G".
POS_FORMAT_FULL_CATEGORY  Japanese format of furl category such like "名詞,一般,*,*".
POS_FORMAT_NUM  the count of format types

Definition at line 152 of file pos_table.cpp.

bool jma::POSTable::loadCombineRule ( const char *  fileName  ) 

Load the combination rule file "pos-combine.def", which is in text format.

Each entry in this file would be like "NC-G NS-G NC-G", the left two columns are POS to combine from, the last column is POS as combination result.

Parameters:
fileName the file name
Returns:
true for success, false for fail
Attention:
if this function is already called before, the rules previously loaded would be removed.

bool jma::POSTable::loadConfig ( const char *  fileName,
Knowledge::EncodeType  src,
Knowledge::EncodeType  dest 
)

Load the configuration file "pos-id.def", which is in text format.

This file contains the part-of-speech configuration, which format is "JapanesePOS index AlphabetPOS".

Parameters:
fileName the file name
src source encode type of fileName
dest destination encode type to convert
Returns:
true for success, false for fail
Attention:
if this function is already called before, the table previously loaded would be removed.
